channel.title: Data-factories on MIP specifications
channel.description: Recent content in Data-factories on MIP specifications

item.title: Data Factory
item.description:
Goals

The main role of the Data Factory is to take data coming from Data capture , process it offline (without any user interaction) then store the results into a database of the Hospital Database Bundle.

  anonymised data => pre-processing + ETL + automated curation => data store
